title: HCLTech bucks trend again, headcount rises by 2,725 employees
description: For the full year as well, Noida-headquartered HCLTech added 1,537 employees from overall headcount of 225,944 in March end 2023. Similarly in FY23, HCLTech’s headcount had shown an increase by 3,674 employees.
content: HCLTech, country’s third largest IT services provider, bucked industry trends to report a rise in headcount of 2,725 employees for the final quarter of FY24.The total employee base stood at 227,481 at the end of March 2024. In the preceding quarter, its employee count was at 224,756 ending December.“This is one of the years we have bucked the trend of adding headcount in the year,” Ramchandran Sundararajan, chief people officer at HCLTech, in a post results conference call.For the full year as well, the Noida-headquartered firm added 1,537 employees from overall headcount of 225,944 in March end 2023. Similarly, in FY23, HCLTech’s headcount had shown an increase by 3,674 employees.In contrast, top tier IT majors TCS, Infosys, Wipro and Tech Mahindra which have announced a cumulative headcount dip of 70,704 employees in FY24.
